description:
Fork of the original Manual_LinkLink_Silasary.
 Do you like item links? Do you wish you could link them together?
 With this you can link your links and play all the links (and more) games together.
 This is also a base that you can customize. Take a peek at the Readme if that interest you.

0.1.0.description:
This release contains the following changes:
I got some Item.json changes that ill probably include in next release

### Major changes
- Simplified some of the hook logic thx Rom-Stein 
- Added UT yamlless support see 54d75e5
- Fixed some Bugs in the hooks

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/nicopop/linklink/compare/2025050600...0.1.0
0.1.0.title: Manual_LinkLink_Nicopopxd - 0.1.0

1.0.0.description:
## Lets call this version 1.0.0:
Im pretty happy with the current state of the code, its not perfect but its better than 2025050600
### Major changes
- Standardized the linklink properties sorting via script see a5b5fe7
- Added support for Skyward Sword, Phantom Hourglass, Spirit Track, Twilight Princess see 0c00136
- Reworked hints to be shuffled per player instead of shuffle with others see d1ef0de
#### Minor Changes
- Added support for deprioritized and reworked extra 900ed2d
- Made some items deprioritized 632ebdc
- Fixed some potential issue with UT and item counts not being set to 0 9b56df5


Do report any bugs/issues either on [Github](https://github.com/nicopop/linklink/issues) or on Discord

Based on Silasary's [linklink](https://github.com/silasary/linklink)

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/nicopop/linklink/compare/0.1.0...1.0.0
1.0.0.title: Manual_LinkLink_Nicopopxd - 1.0.0

1.1.0.description:
## A Bugfix update
- Fix UT mode not setting the correct items count to 0
-  Fix In UT mode not counting the items in StartInv from pool
- Normalized all the file endings

Do report any bugs/issues either on [Github](https://github.com/nicopop/linklink/issues) or on Discord

Based on Silasary's [linklink](https://github.com/silasary/linklink)

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/nicopop/linklink/compare/1.0.0...1.1.0
To compare with Silasary's version https://github.com/silasary/linklink/compare/main...nicopop:linklink:main
1.1.0.title: Manual_LinkLink_Nicopopxd - 1.1.0

1.2.0.description:
## Changes
- Fixed bug that only occur when $buffer creates fillers and there are less "real" items to remove than key used
- Added Ship of Harkinian Support
- Updated to latest Manual Source which include multiple misc changes

Do report any bugs/issues either on [Github](https://github.com/nicopop/linklink/issues) or on Discord

Based on Silasary's [linklink](https://github.com/silasary/linklink)

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/nicopop/linklink/compare/1.1.0...1.2.0
